item.title: Voice of America Moving Swiftly to Assert Trump's Vision
item.description: As it has with other government agencies, the Trump administration is moving swiftly to assert its vision at the Voice of America.

item.description: Biden-nominated federal Judge blocks the National Institutes of Health from applying a standard indirect cost rate of 15% across the board for grants.
